mapper.sql: a.USER_ID, a.USERNAME, a.PASSWORD, a.SALT, a.EMAIL, a.MOBILE, a.STATUS, a.DEPT_ID, a.CREATE_TIME, a.NICK_NAME
mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select , b.NAME as dept_name from SYS_USER a left join SYS_DEPT b on a.DEPT_ID = b.DEPT_ID
and USERNAME !='admin'
and a.NICK_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
and a.USERNAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
